name: MiniCar Race - 极品飞车2019 Mini
description: Little Cars, BIG Fun! Start your engines! The most vibrant, super racing game you’ve ever seen is here! Unlock all kinds of fun cars! Challenge multiple race tracks, multiple racing modes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core or similar Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 Storage: 1 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 210 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
